1486400.name: Ambient Channels: Infinity Jukebox - Internet Radio
1486400.description: This free DLC add-on for Infinity Jukebox adds internet radio support.  You can start one of the 300 included stations via the Infinity Jukebox menu, or have a radio program you'd like to wake up to? Select one of the stations as a music source for an Ambiance Machine event.  If you'd like to add your own stations, please add a comment to discussions so we can track how important that is to our users.
1486400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
